divs: sighting detailson 10 july 2013 at about 6:53pm, an unknown object was spotted "floating" in singapore sky. the object was at a rather high attitude. it was a relatively clear day, with some clouds. the object can be seen easily as it seemed to reflect sunlight on its surface. please see the attached video. there seemed to be a smaller object around the bigger one. the smaller object could not be seen with naked eyes. i found the object after reviewing the video file. video was shot with full optical zoom at 70x. the object disappear among the cloud after "floating" around and among the cloud. i waited for 5 minutes, but the object did not re-appear. however, an unknown craft was seen around the same area of the sky where the object was earlier. the craft was at a high altitude. i was not able to capture on my video camera, as both of my batteries were flat at that time. the craft can be seen easily as it leaves a clear contrail. however, i could not see the shape\color\structure of the craft (with my naked eyes) as it was a long distance away. the craft disappeared after about 10 seconds. if you need any clarification, please contact my email address. thank you.
Summary: Unknown object floating in Singapore sky
trends: There have been no other sightings in Singapore
This sighting has never been favorited.
